name: The Newzealand Story
overview: Tiki the kiwi stars in the adventure of a lifetime in this arcade No 1 hit. Watch the feathers fly as you guide Tiki through the islands of NewZealand solving mazes, defeating fiendish foes, rescuing his kiwi friends and finally facing the evil Wally Walrus in the ultimate battle. Will you be the next dish on the fresh kiwi menu? Only time will tell and it is running out fast!
